TopicTitle: Rotate Navball Direction without Rotating Craft

Articles.Content: This is another interesting thing that needs addressing: It should be possible to rotate a command module's direction for purposes of controlling where the front of the navball is. This would avoid having to add in extra probe cores and/or docking ports for a craft that moves in multiple directions (such as a VTOL lander), but more importantly helps avoid having to stick a probe core on the front of a lander to drive it effectively (seriously, even the Rovemate's navball points straight upwards when the best way to drive a rover is with a sideways-pointing navball to show the direction the rover is going in).
This seems like a wonderful idea. However I'd bring it up to Add-On Development as well.
